hasMenuItem.name: Blueberry Açaí Bowl
hasMenuItem.description:
Base: almond milk, açaí*, banana, blueberry, arrowroot, almond butter, and your choice of protein. Garnish: banana, blueberry, almonds, and hemp granola. PLEASE NOTE: WE ARE CURRENTLY OUT OF FRESH BLUEBERRIES DUE TO A SHORTAGE ISSUE. PLEASE LET US KNOW YOUR SUBSTITUTION CHOICE. WE APOLOGIZE FOR THE INCONVENIENCE.

*Acai contains Guarana, a natural source of caffeine

review.reviewBody: Everything was amazing Except the Peanut Butter Cup Smoothie it was chalky very warm
big fan, great bowls, sadly found a new allergy so they lose a star because life is unfair
Best açai bowls! And only from this location. The team here is extremely good at what they do. Thx guys!
Wasn't a full smoothie, watery, lacked flavor. Straw broke too. Tragic tale all around.
My order always arrives fast and I love their smoothies and acai bowls. The taste quality do not disappoint.
